channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets

item.title: ‘We are financially secure’: My fiancée and I are 61. I’m moving into her home. What are the pitfalls?
item.description: “Once I have moved in with her, the plan is to rent out my house.”

item.title: Trump revives call to ditch quarterly earnings reports. What comes next?
item.description: European companies already report twice yearly. Trump wants to allow U.S. businesses to do the same.

item.title: ‘I spend 5 hours a day on my portfolio’: I’m 70 and received $300K in a lawsuit. Here’s my foolproof financial plan.
item.description: “It’s important to find a way to manage your emotions to prevent them from damaging your financial and personal future.”

item.title: This ‘digital cash’ yields enough to make banks worry that you’ll leave them
item.description: Regulated U.S.-dollar stablecoins could become as ordinary as money-market funds — and help the greenback keep its global dominance.

item.title: And now for Washington’s next trick — sawing the dollar’s value in half
item.description: Pay $24 now, get $13 in 30 years: This Treasury-bond investment has only one winner — and it’s not you.
